Mobster took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster =
aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, Decembe=
r 22, 2000 7:01 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Razor Claw stood conf=
used for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and h=
urled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked look=
ing up at the bot he challenged. 
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, December 21, =
2000 10:50 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Gigas didn't move an i=
nch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

    Gigas: How about this=
, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

    M=
obster switches voices.

    Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
      Subject: R=
e: Sorry soulstice


      Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showi=
ng no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you=
 knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to th=
e Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and threw a=
n upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
        ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
        From: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
 Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry sou=
lstice


        Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't=
 my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, =
I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt =
of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, yo=
u should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

        Gigas=
 stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
          ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
          Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
          Subject:=
 Sorry soulstice


          Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle=
. I found it.

          claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2=
 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in t=
he air and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. =
Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure=
 and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gi=
gas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

          Razor Claws head snapped ba=
ck from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't sho=
w pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but =
he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold ba=
ck a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to elimina=
te you in an unfair fight".
            ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
       From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent:=
 Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
            Subject: Re: three on one h=
ardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


            OOC: Hey, =
Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
              ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
            =
  Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.=



              Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the bat=
tle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported hi=
s actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were =
out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword=
 and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice.=
"

              He aproached the three bots ready for battle and hoping th=
at things won't be ended peacefully.
                ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                From: dachande 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
              =
  Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                ::Eclipse/Wolv=
eritron/Ramus::
                 
                    They had heard the ba=
ttling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclips=
e and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exi=
ted the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.











          eGr=
oups Sponsor
